mapper.select: select t.PAY_ID PayId, t.PAY_TITLE PayTitle, c.NAME CompanyName, t.PAY_MONTH PayMonth,t.Status, t.CREATE_TIME CreateTime, u.TRUENAME CreatorName from HR_SALARY_PAY t left join HR_COMPANY c on t.COMPANY_ID=c.COMPANY_ID left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.PAY_TITLE like '%${value}%' order by t.STATUS,t.PAY_ID desc

select e.PERSON_ID PersonId, e.PERSON_NAME PersonName, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as BasicWage, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as AidWageOne, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as AidWageTwo, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as AidWageThree, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as WageCount, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as Pension, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as Unemployment, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as Health, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as BuckleCount, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as TrueWage, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as Insurance, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as Fund, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as ServiceWage, CAST(0 as decimal(18,0)) as [Count] from HR_EMPLOYEE e where e.COMPANY_ID=${value}
select t.PAY_ID PayId, t.PAY_TITLE PayTitle, t.COMPANY_ID CompanyId, t.PAY_MONTH PayMonth, t.STATUS Status from HR_SALARY_PAY t where t.PAY_ID=${value}
select t.PAY_ID PayId, t.ITEM_ID ItemId, t.PERSON_ID PersonId , t.PAY_VALUE PayValue from HR_SALARY_PAY_VALUE t where t.PAY_ID=${value}
select t.PAY_ID PayId from HR_SALARY_PAY t where t.COMPANY_ID=#{CompanyId} and t.PAY_MONTH=#{PayMonth}

select c.NAME 单位名称,v1.itemname 险种名称,v1.PAY_MONTH 计划月度,b.PERSON_NAME 个人姓名,b.CARD_ID 身份证号码, v1.ITEM_VALUE 个人缴存,v1.ITEM_CMP_VALUE 单位缴存,v2.ITEM_VALUE 个人缴存合计,v2.ITEM_CMP_VALUE 单位缴存合计 from ( select b.COMPANY_ID, b.CARD_ID,a.PAY_MONTH,a.IMPORT_COLUMN_NAME itemname,sum(a.ITEM_VALUE) ITEM_VALUE,sum(a.ITEM_CMP_VALUE) ITEM_CMP_VALUE from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA a inner JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE b on b.PERSON_ID=a.PERSON_ID where a.PAY_MONTH='#{PayMonth}' and a.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206) group by b.COMPANY_ID, b.CARD_ID,a.PAY_MONTH,a.IMPORT_COLUMN_NAME ) v1 LEFT JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE b on b.CARD_ID=v1.CARD_ID left join HR_COMPANY c on c.COMPANY_ID=b.COMPANY_ID left join ( select b.COMPANY_ID,a.PAY_MONTH,a.IMPORT_COLUMN_NAME itemname,sum(a.ITEM_VALUE) ITEM_VALUE,sum(a.ITEM_CMP_VALUE) ITEM_CMP_VALUE from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA a inner JOIN HR_EMPLOYEE b on b.PERSON_ID=a.PERSON_ID where a.PAY_MONTH='#{PayMonth}' and a.ITEM_ID in (201,202,203,204,205,206) group by b.COMPANY_ID,a.PAY_MONTH,a.IMPORT_COLUMN_NAME ) v2 on v2.COMPANY_ID=b.COMPANY_ID and v2.PAY_MONTH=v1.PAY_MONTH and v2.itemname=v1.itemname order BY v1.PAY_MONTH,v1.itemname, c.NAME, b.PERSON_NAME
